1.content:
The next morning you wake up, with little memory of the text message that you had quickly ignored hours before, thinking of it as nothing more than a hazy dream. But it was a Saturday so you put it behind you and went on with you morning.

Your Spring break started next week and you still hadn’t decided what you wanted to do, but it was going to be a nice long week so it was really a matter of what to do first. At the moment you were at your apartment, you were in your third year of college so you live off campus with three roommates.

You could stay there for a couple days and just relax. You managed to take care of all your homework and everything so that you enjoy your break. Besides you promised your friends that you would spend some time with them over the break. Or you could drive a few hours north to visit some friends you rarely get to see. Since the drive is so long and gas is so high it’s been a while since you’ve visited. Or you could go home first and see you Family and friends back in your home town. You spend so much time focusing on school that you don’t get to see them as much as you would like.

Then you smile and thing, “I’ve got a whole week, I’m sure I’ll get a chance to see everyone.” And besides no matter where you go first there should be a beautiful girl or two that has been waiting to get you all to herself.
1.title: A Long Weekend

11.content:
Well you figured you were already there so why waste gas coming back early when you could go ahead take care of your business at college first. But now you have another choice, who to hang out with first? You could do something with your roommates before they went their separate ways, or you could hang out with your other friends, or at least the ones that were still in town. And there was always Jackie, your college friend with benefits that made you promise to see her before you left.

Your roommates hadn’t told you there plans yet so you didn’t even know who if any of them were still there. But it was still early; Matt wasn’t what you would call a morning person so he was most likely still asleep. He’s was a biology major that spends the majority of his free time playing first person shooter games online, and is usually up till around 3:00 am. You could hear someone watching TV in the living room and figured that must be Nick; he’s a business major that likes to wake up to eat breakfast and catch the news about this time And you never know what Tony is going to do, he’s an impulsive art major. He randomly disappears to go off and hang out with his friends and then comes back with the wildest stories. And as different as the four of you are, for some reason you all get along real well.

Most of your friends had already left to go home or the beach, some skipped Friday and just left Thursday. But you had a few friends that said they’d be in town till Monday. You actually had a message on your phone when you woke up from Ashley and Chelsea, two of your friend that lived in the building across from your, saying they wanted to see you. But you figured since it was a text it was nothing urgent.

And you couldn’t forget about Jackie, your college friend with benefits. It had already been about three months since you met her at the gym. You have never been an epic player when it comes to the ladies, but when you find one; they find you addictive for some reason. She’s cute and cool as hell, but she tends to get possessive so you want to stay with just friends for now, not to mention the sex is good so you just go with it.

So which one should you go with first?

As you’re leaving your apartment you see a familiar face walking your way. It's your formerly friend Doug, looking depressed as usual.

You roomed together when you started college and were really close for about the first 6 months. Though he’s not a full-on geek, he was shy and rooming with you helped him come out of his shell. So much so that by the second year he had made his own friends. But when he found a girlfriend the two of you started growing apart though you always tried to stay in touch.

At the start of your third year he and his girlfriend got an apartment together a few floors above yours. At first you thought this would be a great year, living with your best buds and having your old friend in the same block. But things quickly turned sour. Doug's girlfriend Jackie left him within the first week, not only was Doug devastated and no matter what you tried you couldn't convince him to pick himself up and get on with his life. So you thought he just needed some space, you didn’t hear from him for months, you tried to call him but it would always go straight to voicemail. A week ago you found out that Doug was having trouble paying the rent by himself so he got a job at the McDonalds drive-through. Working all the shifts he could to make ends meet. And you do still feel guilty for what happened between you and Jackie.

About a month ago you were working out in the gym and bumped into her. She asked you to go for a drink and what started out as an innocent chat about Doug somehow turned into a night of wild sex. You knew it was wrong but Jackie is really hot and you couldn't resist. One night turned into two, then three and then before you knew it; it had turned into regular thing - Gym, drink, sex. You told yourself it was OK, after all they had been apart for months now and it wasn't like she was your girlfriend. Just a friend with benefits. Unfortunately Doug saw it a different way. Three weeks into your "friendship" with Jackie, her roommate had let Doug in, whilst you and Jackie were in bed. Doug flipped, calling Jackie a slut and accusing you of betraying him. He was furious but not half as furious as Jackie who let loose on him. Telling him that you were twice the man he was, and how you satisfied her like he never could. He was speechless, so he just walked out and since then he has given you the cold shoulder when you tried to apologies. After a while you gave up, you still see Jackie from time to time, and he still pretends that you don’t exist.

So you pass by each other as you walk down the hallway and as usual knocks you with his shoulder and gives you a look of disgust. His sweat stained uniform tells you he has just got off an early shift from McD's.

For a moment you consider just taking it like usually but for some reason you stop and say, "Come on man, this has to stop!" but he ignores you and walks up the stairs. Screw him, but he was your best friend and you needed to sort this out once and for all. You run up the stairs and catch Doug just as he is opening the door to his apartment. Seeing you running towards him, he quickly enters but you manage to get a foot in the door.

"Doug stop. We need to talk." you shout.

"I have nothing to say to you Aaron." he replies, but you manage to work your way into his apartment. It's a mess. Take out and pizza boxes are strewn across the coffee table. Clothes are everywhere. Doug has not recovered like you hoped.

Ignoring the pig-style, you continue. "Look Doug, you’re going to hear me out whether you like it or not. I'm sorry. I thought you were over Jackie. But if you're not then fine. I won't see her anymore."

Doug steps back and rubs his eyes. "You would do that?" he asks quietly.

Relived your finally getting somewhere you press on. "Of course man. Our friendship means much more to me. Jackie and I are just playing around. But you got to realize that even that won't make her want to be with you again. It's over. She's moved on and so do you. So how about we sit down and talking this out?" you ask

Doug sighs. "Maybe. I'm not sure Aaron. Anyway, weren't you going somewhere?"

"Na just taking a walk, I'll stay here and we can do whatever you want. You can even kick my ass if you like?" you say with a smile.

Doug's face cracks into a slight grin. "Ok man. Speaking of doing what I want, what was with that crazy txt last night saying I had control of you for a week?" he asks.

"What? Oh yeah I don’t know I got some kind of weird message last night too, Just ignore it; I'm sure it’s nothing." You reply

12311121122122.title: Time for a change

info.brief_description: You never believed the consequences of ignoring a chain text, until now!
info.description:
Alright all my beloved readers and writers, I thought it was about time I start revising some of my older stories. So you will start to see a few changes; Updating introduction and tags, removing pointless fillers, replacing expired picture links, and make new options to get the story going again.

And I would like to add that this story as well as many of my others was inspired by another story from this site entitled Your Transformation Adventure in which due to a family curse a guy is at the mercy of his mother and sister that can transform his body at will. Unfortunately I have just discovered that the story has been taken down, and though I do not remember enough about the set up to properly recreate it so that it may live on, but I do dedicate this story to the literary genius that has had an impact on all of my work.

These days we live in a world where nearly everyone has a cell phone, and where millions of people enjoy text messaging as a quick and easy form of communication. Unfortunately this new form of communication has given an old very annoying practice new life, turning chain mail into chain messages.

Now some chain messages aren’t so bad, designed to spread information or convey a meaningful or sometimes amusing sentiment. But some carry on the tradition of the much feared chain letter, praying on the superstitious to continue a meaningless if not aggravating message just to avoid the penalty. But most people just ignore it the second they see the word “Forward” without even reading it.

You’re Aaron, a college student in his early twenties. You love texting but one morning around 3am you receive a random text message from an unknown number. You naturally look to see what it says but as soon as you see it’s a chain text you quickly close your phone and go back to bed.

But if you had read it you would have known that it said, “Forward to ten people within the next ten minutes or give everyone in your phone complete control over you for a week,” So exactly ten minutes after your phone was closed a message was sent to every number in your phone which read, “You are here by granted complete control over Aaron Grant for the next week. Control is defined as to manipulate said individuals: age, appearance, gender, size, as well as animal, and object transformation, also including action control but not mental changes.” If you only knew what was coming you would have stayed in bed.

So the idea is you wake up and your friends and family quickly realize that the message they got when they woke up was for real. Now they have complete control over you, they can change anything about you, or turn you into anything. And this isn't the kind of story where you are supposed to learn a lesson, it’s just one week where you’re at the mercy of others, they get a good laugh and you just have to deal with.

Now pretty much anything goes but try and keep it relevant to the idea, and please:
1. When adding content make it meaningful and try to make it at least a solid paragraph, if it’s just pointless fillers it’s gone.
2. Be careful with mental changes, if he’s not mentally there to react to the situation what’s the point?
3. For transformations, no ridiculous obesity, I’ve read stories on this site with character being four hundred pounds with vivid detail, not here.
4. No gay stuff, even if he may technically be a girl but he’s still a guy, so no willing attraction to guys
5. With the new male attention that comes with female body, no friends falling in love with him, and no rape, they can hit on him, flirt, and sexually harass him but if it crosses the line it’s gone

Please keep in mind that none of my stories are meant to be about sex or playing with the new body so keep it to a minimum, and he isn’t supposed to be enjoying this, so he shouldn’t be happy about any transformations.

And I want to see my stories grow but if I’m the only one writing it’s no fun. So if you have any comments or suggestions please feel free to send me a message, I would be more than happy to take requests. So please add, and help me make this story a success.
